name: City Defender (Blackhorse15A)
description:
Defend your city. Click on a blue unit to select them, then click where you want them to move to. Only one unit can move at a time. If the red army destroys your entire city wall you lose. If the red army enters your city you lose.

This is my improved version from my entry for Trijam 174.  The theme was "Game Based on a Quote".  This version is about 9 or 10 hours of work. This version has improved sprites, animations, and improvements to the game logic. See the original entry here (made with only 3 hours).

Made using microstudio.dev with Quick library. I made the code and sprites myself.

CREDITS

  • Music: “Hitch a Ride”, from PlayOnLoop.com. Licensed under Creative Commons by Attribution 4.0
  • Sound effects from Groovy's Retro Sound Effects by GroovyMaster
